a.style: background-color: #172b3e; color: #ffffff; cursor: pointer; padding: 5px 12px; margin-top: 20px;

section.class: component component-builder component-builder-2 content text-center narrow col-1

img.alt: North Chandler | Legacy Traditional School - Logo
North Chandler | Legacy Traditional School - Logo

img.p: Welcome to Legacy North Chandler. We are tuition-free, public charter school located on the corners of Warner and McQueen and have been proudly educating students from Chandler since 2016. At Legacy Traditional, we believe in a proven, traditional education to build character and help create bright futures for our students from kindergarten through 8th grade. We focus on direct instruction with an emphasis not only on academics but ensuring that every young learner has an opportunity to participate in music, performing arts, athletics as well as multiple extracurricular activities.

section.class: component component-builder component-builder-3 content text-left border col-2

div.p: As a public charter school, we are always accepting applications for all grades. Learn more about life at Legacy by scheduling an in-person tour.

section.class: component component-builder component-builder-5 content text-left border

img.alt: Charter School in North Chandler, AZ
Charter School in North Chandler, AZ

section.class: component component-builder component-builder-7 content align-content text-left border col-3

img.alt: Kindergarten in North Chandler, AZ | Legacy Traditional
Kindergarten in North Chandler, AZ | Legacy Traditional

div.p: Our Tuition-Free Full-Day Kindergarten program in North Chandler empowers young learners to be ready for school and set them up for success in life. Legacy Traditional teachers focus on activities that will help your child develop in areas of language, math, reading readiness, and creativity.

img.alt: Elementary School in North Chandler, AZ
Elementary School in North Chandler, AZ

div.p: Legacy North Chandler has seen great success with our Back-to-Basics approach to elementary school including an accelerated pace of Language Arts and mathematics, high expectations for academics and behavior, self-contained K-6 classrooms, bell-to-bell instruction, and more.

img.alt: Middle School in North Chandler, AZ | Legacy Traditional
Middle School in North Chandler, AZ | Legacy Traditional

div.p: At Legacy Traditional, we’ve selected proven curriculum and programs designed to help each student. You’ll see that our experience and knowledge has led to a comprehensive set of tools for the middle school grades which prepares students to succeed in high school, college, and further study.

section.class: component component-builder component-builder-9 content text-center narrow col-1

div.h2: Start your child’s life at Legacy
div.p: We care about your child just like you do, and we want the very best for them, too. There is no better way to prepare them for future success than with a well-rounded education at Legacy North Chandler.

div.div: © 2020 Copyright Legacy Traditional Schools All rights reserved.
